thread.title: Germany offers of plethora of activities for car enthusiastsTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Germany offers of plethora of activities for car enthusiastsTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Germany offers of plethora of activities for car enthusiastsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Germany offers of plethora of activities for car enthusiasts Published on : Wednesday, August 19, 2015
If you’re a car enthusiast, there are many reasons to visit Germany this September. The 66th International Motor Show (IAA) in Frankfurt is taking place from 17 to 27 September, for example.
At the event, you can find out about all the latest trends in e-mobility or test your driving skills on a challenging off-road course. Either way it’s bound to be interesting!
Fans of motorsport might also like to head to the Nürburgring in the Eifel region between 25 and 27 September, where the penultimate race in the 2015 German Touring Car Masters (DTM) season is being held.
The Nürburgring is steeped in tradition and is one of the longest, most demanding and most actively used racetracks in the world.
Nürburgring was also voted one of Germany’s Top 100 sights by international visitors in 2015. Come along and see why!
Source: GNTB
